name: Paper Attack
description:
This game was made only in 24h!!!! as a challenge. Paper attack! Try your skills at piloting a paper plane upgrade your plane and kill pesky birds in my first and latest top down shooter game!

Your goal is to dash into enemies by using left shift and to get the highest score possible.

Slash birds, break balloons and shoot to planes to make them BOOM!!! 

Also check out my facebook page where i post updates about the game which I am currently working on called "Call of Kraken"

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ELCO-Gaming-102295465009663/

Controls:

W - move forward

A,D - left and right (you know this you are a gamer)

Left shitf to dash

You can buy three things in the shop:
-The frontal armor, which allows you to slash birds without having to dash.
-The wing armor, which gives you 3 additional health points.
-Guns, which allow you to ..shoot (wow incredible).

See you in the sky.

Ps. I am incredibly sorry for all the issues you may encounter in the game. I didn't have much time to fix them
